me.kiip.api
Interface Kiip.ViewListener

Enclosing class:
Kiip
public static interface Kiip.ViewListener

Interface for receiving notifications of Kiip views showing/dismissing.

Author:
Grantland Chew
See Also:
Kiip.startSession(android.app.Activity, me.kiip.api.Kiip.RequestListener), Kiip.unlockAchievement(java.lang.String, me.kiip.api.Kiip.RequestListener, java.lang.String...), Kiip.saveLeaderboard(java.lang.String, int, me.kiip.api.Kiip.RequestListener, java.lang.String...), Kiip.showResource(me.kiip.api.Resource)
